disclaimer: This is not a medical diagnosis. For emergencies, call 108 immediately.

templates.HIGH_EMERGENCY: Your symptoms suggest a potentially serious condition. Please call 108 or go to the nearest emergency facility immediately. Do not delay seeking care.
templates.HIGH_DISTRICT: Your symptoms need urgent attention. Please visit the nearest District Hospital as soon as possible. If condition worsens, call 108.
templates.MEDIUM_PHC: Your symptoms need medical attention. Please visit your nearest Primary Health Centre (PHC) within 24 hours. Rest and stay hydrated meanwhile.
templates.MEDIUM_CHC: Your symptoms need a specialist evaluation. Please visit a Community Health Centre (CHC) within 24 hours.
templates.LOW_HOME: Your symptoms appear mild. Rest, stay hydrated, and monitor your condition. Visit a PHC if symptoms worsen or persist beyond 2-3 days.
templates.DEFAULT: We recommend visiting your nearest PHC for a proper evaluation. Stay hydrated and rest.

clarifying_questions.severity: How severe are your symptoms — mild, moderate, or severe?
clarifying_questions.associated: Do you have any other symptoms like fever, cough, or body ache?
